meanings.definition: A member of a staff, especially in a professional organization.
meanings.sent1: The staffers at the hospital work hard to help patients.
meanings.sent2: The company hired new staffers to assist with the project.
meanings.sent3: The staffers had a race to see who could answer the phone first.
meanings.sent4: In the busy office, the staffers were like busy bees buzzing around.
meanings.sent5: The staffers' dedication to their work was truly admirable.

meanings.sent1: Many staffers attended the meeting to discuss the upcoming event.
meanings.sent2: The staffers' uniforms were all the same color for easy identification.
meanings.sent3: The staffers decided to have a potluck lunch to celebrate their hard work.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with chatter as the staffers shared ideas and plans.
meanings.sent5: The teamwork among the staffers was crucial for the success of the project.
